title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node and modern browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or embeddings provider.

title: ollama-webui (formerly ollama-ui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style interface) with multi-user support.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community CLI that wraps Ollama with conversation history, prompt templates and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-like VS-Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline suggestions.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Reference implementation of retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) backed by Ollama embeddings.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to chat with Ollama models, generate code or docs from within the editor.

title: ollama-embeddings
summary: Minimal FastAPI service exposing Ollama embedding endpoints for semantic search pipelines.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models and switch personalities.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to spin up Ollama containers in CI pipelines for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community-maintained Rust crate providing typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat UI that connects to any Ollama instance and supports multi-model threads.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for AI-assisted note writing using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash command for chatting with locally hosted models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset, allowing Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Collection of ready-made docker-compose stacks (CPU/GPU, Open-WebUI, RAG, etc.) for Ollama.

title: ollama-huggingface
summary: Scripts to convert and quantize Hugging Face models into Ollama-compatible GGUF format.
